title.rendered: “Israeli Home Front Command Orders Demolition of Terrorist’s House Following Fatal Ram Junction Attack”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The head of the Home Front Command has signed a decree for the demolition and sealing of the terrorist’s house who carried out the shooting attack at Ram Junction

The head of the Home Front Command, Major General Raffi Miluah, signed last night (Sunday) a decree for the demolition and sealing of the house where the terrorist Fadi Jamajem lived in the Shuafat refugee camp in East Jerusalem.

The terrorist carried out the shooting attack at the Ram Junction on February 16, 2024, in which Staff Sergeant (Res.) Uri Yaish, of blessed memory, was killed, an Israeli civilian was murdered, and other civilians were injured. The IDF shares the families’ grief.

The decree was signed after the objection on the subject was rejected.
